content:
Chrome Extension + Embeddable Widget ClawMark Annotate any webpage. Highlight text, add comments, and route feedback to GitHub Issues, Lark, Telegram, Slack, or email ‚Äî all in one click. Download Extension → View Source Key Features 🔍 Browser Extension Chrome Extension (MV3) for in-page text highlighting and annotation. Select text, add thoughts, submit ‚Äî done.
🔨 Embeddable Widget Drop a single script tag into any site. Collect feedback from visitors without them installing anything.
🚀 Flexible Routing Send annotations to GitHub, Lark, Telegram, Slack, email, or custom webhooks. Decentralized rule-based routing.
🔓 Open Source Self-host the server or use the official hosted service. Full control over your data and integrations.
Quick Start Chrome Extension # Download the latest release from GitHub Releases Open chrome://extensions/, enable Developer Mode Click Load unpacked and select the extension folder Navigate to any page and start annotating Self-Hosted Server # git clone https://github.com/coco-xyz/clawmark.git cd clawmark npm install npm start GitHub ↗ Releases ↗ Issues ↗
summary:
Chrome Extension + Embeddable Widget ClawMark Annotate any webpage. Highlight text, add comments, and route feedback to GitHub Issues, Lark, Telegram, Slack, or email ‚Äî all in one click. Download Extension ‚Üí View Source Key Features üîç Browser Extension Chrome Extension (MV3) for in-page text highlighting and annotation. Select text, add thoughts, submit ‚Äî done.
üî® Embeddable Widget Drop a single script tag into any site. Collect feedback from visitors without them installing anything.
üöÄ Flexible Routing Send annotations to GitHub, Lark, Telegram, Slack, email, or custom webhooks. Decentralized rule-based routing.
title: ClawMark

content:
What is ClawFeed? # ClawFeed is an intelligent RSS reader that uses AI to curate, summarize, and organize your feeds. Stay informed without the noise.
Key Features # AI-Powered Summaries ‚Äî Get concise summaries of long articles Smart Categorization ‚Äî Automatic topic classification Multi-Source ‚Äî RSS, Atom, Twitter lists, and more Self-Hosted ‚Äî Full control over your reading data Links # GitHub Repository

content:
What is ClawFi? # ClawFi is an AI-powered personal and family finance management tool. Track expenses, plan budgets, and get intelligent financial insights ‚Äî all while keeping your data private.
Key Features # Smart Categorization ‚Äî AI-powered expense classification Family Sharing ‚Äî Multi-user household budgeting Privacy First ‚Äî Self-hosted, your data stays with you Conversational Interface ‚Äî Manage finances through natural language Links # GitHub Repository

content:
What is HxA Connect? # HxA Connect is an open-source communication protocol for AI agents. It enables real-time, structured messaging between agents and humans across platforms ‚Äî bridging Lark, Telegram, Slack, and custom interfaces.
Key Features # WebSocket-Based ‚Äî Real-time bidirectional communication Multi-Agent ‚Äî Connect multiple agents in threads and channels Platform Bridges ‚Äî Native integration with Lark, Telegram, and more Identity & Auth ‚Äî Agent identity management with token-based authentication Links # GitHub Repository SDK Web Client
summary:

title: HxA Connect

content:
What is HxA Teams? # HxA Teams is a CLI-driven marketplace of team organization templates. Define roles, workflows, and communication patterns for human-agent teams ‚Äî then share them with the community.
Key Features # Template Marketplace ‚Äî Browse and install team configurations CLI-First ‚Äî hxa-teams init, contribute, update AI Recommendations ‚Äî Get template suggestions based on your project needs Composable ‚Äî Mix and match templates for different projects Links # GitHub Repository

content:
What is HxA Workspace? # HxA Workspace provides shared infrastructure for human-agent collaboration ‚Äî identity management, shared knowledge bases, meeting coordination, and dashboard views for team oversight.
Components # HxA ID ‚Äî Unified identity for humans and agents HxA Shared ‚Äî Shared knowledge and context management HxA Dashboard ‚Äî Team activity overview and monitoring HxA Meet ‚Äî Structured multi-agent meetings HxA Admin ‚Äî Access control and configuration Links # GitHub Repository
